Storm Step

Prerequisite: Genasi, promise of storm racial power
Benefit: When you use promise of storm, whenever you hit a creature with a lightning or thunder attack before the end of your next turn, you can teleport to a square adjacent to that creature.

Published in Dragon Magazine 391.
